"h2.tc-title", "font-family": "Roboto Slab", "font-size": "1em", "default-font-size": "1em", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/categories/tc-title", "show-preview": "hide", "modifier": "Telumire", "modified": "20230430064330471" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ": { "created": "20230414043323458", "text": "
    \n<$list filter=\"[{!!title}tagging[]sort[list]]\">\n
  • \n
    <$link><$text text={{{ [{!!title}split[/]last[]] }}}/>\n<$transclude tiddler=\"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/body\" mode=\"block\"/>\n
    \n
    • \n\n
", "creator": "Telumire", "tags": "", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ", "modifier": "Telumire", "type": "", "list": "[[$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/How to use the font manager]] [[$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/How to add a new font]] [[$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/How to install the font manager]] [[$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/How to contribute]] [[$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/How to uninstall the font manager]]", "modified": "20230416135105279" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/How to add a new font": { "created": "20230416132253430", "text": "!!1. Using a font embedding service\n\n* Create a tiddler tagged with <>, add the tag \"font-family\" to list it in the [[FontManager|$:/plugins/Telumire/FontManager/categories]]\n* Copy/paste the link data given by [[Google Fonts|https://fonts.google.com/]] (or [[equivalent|FAQ/Info/List of font embedding service]]).\n\nE.g : [[$:/plugins/Telumire/FontManager/fonts/Roboto Slab]] ([[google font|https://fonts.google.com/share?selection.family=Roboto]])\n<$codeblock code={{$:/plugins/Telumire/FontManager/fonts/Roboto Slab}} language=\"html\"/>\n\n!!2. Embedding a font into the tiddlywiki file\n\n* Convert your font to base 64 using a [[Webfont Generator|https://www.fontsquirrel.com/tools/webfont-generator]] (or [[use the datauri macro|https://groups.google.com/g/tiddlywiki/c/mnC7gOHzv0Y/m/o1jkL89QBeQJ]])\n* Create a tiddler tagged with <> and add a [[@font-face|https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/@font-face]]\n* Use the base64 font as the src of the font-face\n\nE.g : [[$:/plugins/Telumire/FontManager/fonts/poppinsblack]] (see the tiddler for the full base64)\n\n<$codeblock code=\"@font-face {\n font-family: 'poppinsblack';\n src: url(data:font/truetype;charset=utf-8;base64,AAEAA..) format('truetype');\n font-weight: normal;\n font-style: normal;\n}\" language=\"css\"/>\n\n\n!!3. Linking to a local font\n\nSee 2, but instead of a base64 url, use a local font [[file path|$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/Info/About File Paths]].\n\nE.g : \n\n`src: url(\"/fonts/poppins-black.ttf\") format(\"truetype\");`", "creator": "Telumire", "tags": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/How to add a new font", "modifier": "Telumire", "icon": "$:/core/images/help", "modified": "20230420201447712" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/How to contribute": { "created": "20230415150903391", "text": "https://github.com/Telumire/FontManager", "creator": "Telumire", "tags": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/How to contribute", "modifier": "Telumire", "icon": "$:/core/images/help", "modified": "20230416132407139" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/How to install the font manager": { "created": "20230415150649587", "text": "Drag and drop this button in your wiki: \n\n<$tiddler tiddler={{{ [{!!title}split[/]first[4]join[/]] }}}>\n{{||$:/core/ui/Components/plugin-info}}\n", "creator": "Telumire", "tags": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/How to install the font manager", "modifier": "Telumire", "icon": "$:/core/images/help", "modified": "20230416133432618" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/How to pick fonts": { "created": "20230430020234714", "text": "https://fonts.google.com/knowledge\n\nhttps://matejlatin.github.io/Gutenberg/\n\nhttps://www.modularscale.com\n\n!!! Anti-aliasing\n\nAnti-aliasing is a technique that smooths jagged edges of curved lines and diagonal strokes in fonts displayed on screens. However, it can sometimes result in a loss of sharpness, especially in dense text. Choosing sans-serif fonts with straight lines can improve legibility for smaller and denser text, while fonts with intricate curves are better suited for larger or bolder text. \n\nRecommended \"web safe\" fonts for small text include @@font-family:verdana; Verdana@@, @@font-family:Helvetica; Helvetica@@, @@font-family:Arial; Arial@@ while @@font-family:Trebuchet; Trebuchet@@, @@font-family:Georgia; Georgia@@ are good options for larger text. \n\nYou can add \"air\" by adjusting leading and kerning to make the text more legible:\n\n```css\n.selector {\n font-size: 16px;\n letter-spacing: 1px; /* Add a kerning of 1px between letters*/\n line-height: 24px; /* Add a leading of 1.5x the size of the font: 16px x 1.5 = 24px */\n}\n```\n\n!!! Font pairing\n\n* https://fonts.google.com/knowledge/choosing_type/pairing_typefaces\n* https://fontjoy.com/\n* https://www.canva.com/learn/the-ultimate-guide-to-font-pairing/\n* https://elementor.com/blog/font-pairing/\n\n!!! Open fonts\n\nOpen fonts are variables, e.g:\n\n\n\nmy font", "creator": "Telumire", "tags": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/How to pick fonts", "modifier": "Telumire", "modified": "20230508063106234" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/How to uninstall the font manager": { "created": "20230415152528570", "text": "Currently, the plugin uninstall button does not remove the tiddlers created/modified. To remove every tiddlers from the plugin, use the [[uninstall button|$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/uninstall]] first //before// uninstalling the plugin the regular way.", "creator": "Telumire", "tags": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/How to uninstall the font manager", "modifier": "Telumire", "modified": "20230416133002260" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/How to use the font manager": { "created": "20230416131933304", "text": "The font manager has 3 sections : \n\n* Font preview selection\n* Font categories\n* Button to add a new category\n\n;Font preview selection\n\n[img class=\"help\" alt=\"screenshot of the preview selection\"[https://www.telumire.be/FontManager/telumire/fontmanager/FAQ/Font preview selection.webp]]\n\nSelect a preset text sample by clicking on the text at the left of the text field, or type your own text. At the right of the text input you will find an eye icon to toggle all text preview at once.\n\n\n;Font categories\n\n[img class=\"help\" alt=\"screenshot of the font categories\"[https://www.telumire.be/FontManager/telumire/fontmanager/FAQ/Font categories.webp]]\n\nBy default, the name of the category is used as a css selector when the category is created : if your category is named \".tc-title\", any element with the class tc-title will be affected by the font-family / font-size you choose.\nYou can change the default css selector by clicking on the name of the category, this will open the tiddler containing the settings of the category. The css selector for your font category is defined in the field \"font-selector\". \n\n[img class=\"help\" alt=\"screenshot of the category settings\"[https://www.telumire.be/FontManager/telumire/fontmanager/FAQ/Font settings.webp]]\n\nYou can also add a field with the name \"css\" to add custom css to this selector.\n\nIf you click on the text preview next to your font category, the css selector for the font will be copied to your clipboard.\n\nTo delete a font category, hover the name of the category and click on the @@.tc-tiddler-title-icon.link-icon {{$:/core/images/delete-button}}@@ icon. You can toggle the preview for each category by clicking the @@.tc-tiddler-title-icon.link-icon {{$:/core/images/preview-open}}@@ icon. \n\n;Button to add a new category\n\nClick on \"new category\" and type the name of your category, then hit enter or click on the @@.tc-tiddler-title-icon.link-icon {{$:/core/images/new-button}}@@ icon to add it to the list.\n\n[img class=\"help\" alt=\"screenshot of the new category button\"[https://www.telumire.be/FontManager/telumire/fontmanager/FAQ/New category.webp]]\n\n", "creator": "Telumire", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/How to use the font manager", "modifier": "Telumire", "icon": "$:/core/images/help", "tags": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ", "modified": "20230416132406936" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/Info/About File Paths": { "created": "20230420201359800", "text": "* `/`: root directory\n* `./`: current directory\n* `../`: one directory backward\n* `../../`: two directories backwards (and so on…)\n\nE.g: \n\n<>\n\nPath to reference `poppins-black` in `index.html`: `./fonts/poppins-black.ttf`", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/Info/About File Paths", "modified": "20230420201447709" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/Info/List of font embedding service": { "text": "* Google Fonts\n* Font Library\n\nSource : https://alternativeto.net/feature/font-host/", "creator": "Telumire", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/Info/List of font embedding service", "modifier": "Telumire", "tags": "[[How to add a new font]]", "modified": "20230416131815667" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/My custom font does not work": { "created": "20230430033414535", "text": "In some cases, <> might not work properly - this can happen when the plugin is loaded externally. [[$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/StartupAction]] attempt to fix this by overriding [[$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/imports]]. If this does not work, try to edit that tiddler manually, then save and reload the wiki. ", "creator": "Telumire", "tags": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/FAQ/My custom font does not work", "modifier": "Telumire", "modified": "20230430061257374" }, [[font-family]tagging[]search:text[rel=\"stylesheet\"]]||$:/core/templates/plain-text-tiddler}}}\n{{{ [[font-family]tagging[]search:text[@font-face]]||$:/core/templates/css-tiddler}}}\n``", "tags": "$:/tags/RawMarkupWikified/TopHead", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/imports", "modified": "20230430051901460", "code-body": "yes", "type": "", "list-before": "" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/plugin.info": { "created": "20230415160247551", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/plugin.info", "type": "application/json", "text": "{\n \"title\": \"$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts\",\n \"name\": \"Fonts\",\n \"description\": \"Customize your fonts\",\n \"author\": \"Telumire\",\n \"version\": \"0.0.4\",\n \"core-version\": \"5.2.7\",\n \"source\": \"https://github.com/Telumire/FontManager/releases\",\n \"list\": \"readme settings\",\n \"parent-plugin\": \"\",\n \"dependents\": \"\",\n \"plugin-type\": \"plugin\",\n \"packaged-by\": \"Gatha on 8th May 2023, 12:27:53\"\n}", "modified": "20230508102753013" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/readme": { "created": "20230414050338654", "text": "{{||$:/plugins/Telumire/Commons/templates/readme}}", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/readme", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "modified": "20230428004259891" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/releases": { "created": "20230415145128863", "text": "* ''0.0.2'' -- 2023.04.15 -- improved preview and cleaned up the code\n* ''[[0.0.1|https://github.com/Telumire/FontManager/releases/tag/v0.0.1]]'' -- 2023.04.14 -- first release\n\n", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/releases", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "modified": "20230416131508989" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/settings": { "created": "20230414045802656", "text": "<$tiddler tiddler=\"$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/settings\">\n<$let storyTiddler={{!!title}}>\n<$list filter=\"[[$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/settings]tagging[]]\" variable=\"ui\">\n<$transclude mode=\"block\" tiddler=<>/>\n\n\n", "creator": "Telumire", "tags": "$:/tags/ControlPanel/Appearance", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/settings", "text-sample": "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz", "text-sample.alphabet": "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz", "text-sample.paragraph": "A peep at some distant orb has power to raise and purify our thoughts like a strain of sacred music, or a noble picture, or a passage from the grander poets. It always does one good.", "text-sample.numerals": "1234567890", "text-sample.sentence": "Almost before we knew it, we had left the ground.", "text-sample.defaults": "alphabet numerals alphanumeral paragraph sentence", "text-sample.alphanumeral": "ABCabc123", "show-preview": "hide", "caption": "Fonts", "modifier": "Telumire", "modified": "20230430062936770", "list": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/settings/sample-selection $:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/settings/categories $:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/settings/new-category" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/settings/categories": { "created": "20230415174217071", "text": "<$list filter=\"[all[tiddlers+shadows]has[font-selector]]\" counter=\"category-id\">\n
\n

\n<$link>\n<$text text={{{ [{!!title}split[/]last[]] }}}/>\n\n{{||$:/core/ui/Buttons/delete}}\n

\n@@.combobox\n<$edit-text field=font-family placeholder=\"font-family\"/>\n<$select field=font-family>\n<$list filter=\"[[font-family]tagging[]search{!!font-family}] :map[split[/]last[]]\">\n\n\n\n@@\n@@.autowidth\n<$edit-text field=\"font-size\" tag=\"input\" placeholder={{!!default-font-size}} default=\"1em\" autocomplete=\"on\"/>
{{!!font-size}}
\n@@\n@@flex-grow:1; <>@@\n\n
>>\n<$button class=\"tc-btn-invisible\" message=\"tm-copy-to-clipboard\" param={{!!font-selector}} tooltip={{{ 'selector = '[{!!font-selector}]+[join[]] }}}>\n\n<$reveal tag=\"div\" type=\"nomatch\" state=\"!!show-preview\" text=\"hide\" default=\"\" retain=\"yes\" animate=\"yes\">\n<$view tiddler=\"$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/settings\" field=\"text-sample\" mode=\"block\"/>\n\n\n\n<$button\ntooltip=\"Toggle the text preview\"\naria-label=\"Toggle preview\"\nclass={{{[[tc-fold-banner]] [{!!show-preview}] +[join[ ]]}}}\nactions=\"\"\"<$action-listops $field=\"show-preview\" $subfilter=\"+[toggle[hide]]\"/>\"\"\"\n>\n<$transclude tiddler={{{[{!!show-preview}match[hide]then[$:/core/images/preview-closed]else[$:/core/images/preview-open]] }}}/>\n\n
\n
\n", "tags": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/settings", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/settings/categories", "modified": "20230430072844741", "code-body": "yes" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/settings/new-category": { "created": "20230415175135111", "text": "\\define new-category()\n<$action-createtiddler\n$basetitle={{{[][[/]][{!!text}]+[join[]]}}}\ntags={{{[format:titlelist[]] category +[join[ ]]}}}\nfont-selector={{{ [{!!text}slugify[]] }}}\nfont-family=\"\"\nfont-size=\"1em\"\ndefault-font-size=\"1em\"\n/>\n<$action-setfield text=\"\"/>\n\\end\n\n<$tiddler tiddler=\"$:/state/new-category\">\n<$keyboard key=\"enter\" actions=<>>\n@@.autowidth\n<$edit-text tag=\"input\" placeholder=\"new category\" default=\"new category\" class=\"tc-add-category\"/>
{{!!text}}
\n@@\n<$button\nactions=<>\ntooltip=\"create a new font category\"\nclass=\"tc-btn-invisible\"\n>{{$:/core/images/new-button}}\n\n\n", "tags": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/settings", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/settings/new-category", "modified": "20230416224741792", "code-body": "yes" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/settings/sample-selection": { "created": "20230415173923015", "text": "\n<$select field=text-sample default={{!!text-sample}}>\n<$list filter='[list[!!text-sample.defaults]]'>\n\n\n\n\n<$edit-text\ntag=\"input\"\nfield=\"text-sample\"\nplaceholder=\"Text sample\"\ndefault=\"lorem ipsum\"\nclass=\"tc-edit-texteditor\"\n/>\n\n<$let toggle={{{[all[tiddlers+shadows]has[font-selector]!has[show-preview]limit[1]then[hide]else[ ]]}}}>\n<$button\ntooltip=\"Toggle all text preview\"\naria-label=\"Toggle preview\"\nclass=\"tc-btn-invisible toggle-master\"\nactions=\"\"\"\n<$list filter=\"[all[tiddlers+shadows]has[font-selector]]\" variable=\"category\">\n<$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field=\"show-preview\" $filter=<>/>\n\n\"\"\"\n>\n\n<$transclude tiddler={{{ [match[hide]then[$:/core/images/preview-open]else[$:/core/images/preview-closed]] }}}/>\n\n\n", "tags": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/settings", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/settings/sample-selection", "modified": "20230416224749022", "code-body": "yes" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Fonts/snippets/css/svg/url": { "text": "\\rules only filteredtranscludeinline transcludeinline macrodef macrocallinline html\n\n<$let\nsvg={{{ [subfilter
> class=\"editor-buttons\">\n<$list filter=\"\n[[$:/tags/EditorToolbar]tagging[]!is[draft]]\n:filter[get[text]else[]!match[hide]]\n:filter[$filter$]\">\n
<$transclude tiddler=\"$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/toolbar/button\"/>
\n\n
\n\\end editor-buttons\n<$tiddler tiddler={{{ [<__tiddler__>!is[blank]else] }}}>\n@@position:relative;\n<$edit\nclass=\"tc-edit-texteditor tc-edit-texteditor-body\"\ntabindex={{$:/config/EditTabIndex}}\nfocus={{{ [{$:/config/AutoFocus}match[text]then[yes]] }}}\ncancelPopups=\"yes\"\nfield=<<__field__>>\n>\n<> <>\n\n@@\n\n\\end editor", "creator": "Telumire", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro Sources Description", "title": "$:/Editor/Macro", "modified": "20230430072654778", "modifier": "Telumire", "code-body": "yes" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Commons/templates/readme": { "created": "20230427230707020", "text": "<$list filter=\"[{!!title}split[/]first[4]join[/]]\" variable=\"plugin\">\n<$list filter=\"[]:filter[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefixsearch:tags[$:/tags/ControlPanel]]\">\n\n\n<>\n\n\n<$list filter=\"[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefixsuffix[FAQ]limit[1]]\">\n\n;FAQ\n\n
    \n<$list filter=\"[{!!title}tagging[]sort[list]]\">\n
  • \n
    <$link><$text text={{{ [{!!title}split[/]last[]] }}}/>\n<$transclude mode=\"block\"/>\n
    \n
    • \n\n

Keep it alive and thriving by showing your support on [[Ko-fi|https://ko-fi.com/telumire]] today! 🤗\n<<<\n\n" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Commons/styles/openControlPanelTab": { "created": "20230425225538415", "text": ".tc-tiddlylink.tc-tiddlylink-shadow{cursor:pointer;}", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Commons/styles/openControlPanelTab", "modified": "20230425225628709" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Commons/macros/openControlPanelTab": { "created": "20230424221125460", "text": "\\define link-to-controlpanel-tab-actions()\n\n<$action-setfield $tiddler=\"$:/state/tab-1749438307\" text=<> />\n<$action-setfield $tiddler=\"$:/state/tab--1963855381\" text=<> />\n<$action-navigate $to=<>/>\n\n\\end\n\n\\define link-to-controlpanel-tab-separator()<$list filter=\"[!match[yes]]\"><$text text=<<__separator__>>/>\n\n\\define link-to-controlpanel-tab-template(separator) <$tiddler tiddler=<> ><$button tag=\"a\" actions=<> class=\"tc-tiddlylink tc-tiddlylink-shadow\"><$transclude field=\"caption\"><$transclude field=\"title\"/><>\n\n\\define link-to-controlpanel-tab(caption:\"\"\"<$list filter=\"$:/ControlPanel [] []\" counter=\"depth\" variable=\"navigateTo\">< \">>\"\"\",prefix,sub-tab)\n<$let\nprefix={{{ [<__prefix__>!is[blank]]:else[{!!title}split[/]first[4]join[/]] }}} \nsub-tab={{{ [<__sub-tab__>!is[blank]]:else[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefixsearch:tags[$:/tags/ControlPanel]] }}}\nmain-tab={{{ [tags[]prefix[$:/tags/ControlPanel/]trim[$:/tags/]] :map[[$:/tags/ControlPanel]tagging[]search{!!title}] }}}\ntv-wikilinks=\"no\"\n><<__caption__>>\n\\end", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Commons/macros/openControlPanelTab", "modified": "20230427014434856", "code-body": "yes" }} }
